Apply smoothing/low frequency filter

Source: R/pupil_smooth.R
pupil_smooth.Rd

This function performs a smoothing function over an array of x The 'zoo' package is a dependency

pupil_smooth(x, type = "hann", window = 5, hz = "")

Arguments

x

xframe
type

The type of smoothing function to apply. Hann or moving window average
window

The size of the smoothing window (default = 5). Value is in milliseconds
hz

The recording frequency (used to calculate window size)

Contents

  • Arguments
